verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.
The same <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

All things <S%G3956><s%> were made <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> any thing <S%G1520><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%>.
In <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> shineth <S%G5316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the darkness <S%G4653><s%> comprehended <S%G2638><s%> it <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.
¶ There was <S%G1096><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, whose <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was John <S%G2491><s%>.

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a witness <S%G3141><s%>, to <S%G2443><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the Light <S%G5457><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> might believe <S%G4100><s%>.
He was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> was sent to <S%G2443><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> that Light <S%G5457><s%>.

That was <S%G2258><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> lighteth <S%G5461><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%> <S%G444><s%> that cometh <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.

He was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.
He came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, to them <S%G846><s%> gave he <S%G1325><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, even to them that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>:

Which <S%G3739><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of man <S%G435><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> dwelt <S%G4637><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, (and <S%G2532><s%> we beheld <S%G2300><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, the glory <S%G1391><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of the only begotten <S%G3439><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>,) full <S%G4134><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

¶ John <S%G2491><s%> bare witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> was he <S%G2258><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I spake <S%G2036><s%>, He that cometh <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> before <S%G4413><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fulness <S%G4138><s%> have <S%G2983><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> received <S%G2983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> for <S%G473><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, but grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

No man <S%G3762><s%> hath seen <S%G3708><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at any time <S%G4455><s%>; the only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the bosom <S%G2859><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, he <S%G1565><s%> hath declared <S%G1834><s%> him.

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the record <S%G3141><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Levites <S%G3019><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he confessed <S%G3670><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; but <S%G2532><s%> confessed <S%G3670><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they asked <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> Elias <S%G2243><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>. Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> that prophet <S%G4396><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%>, No <S%G3756><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said they <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> art thou <S%G1488><s%>? that <S%G2443><s%> we may give <S%G1325><s%> an answer <S%G612><s%> to them that sent <S%G3992><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>. What <S%G5101><s%> sayest thou <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>?

He said <S%G5346><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am the voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, Make straight <S%G2116><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> they which <S%G3588><s%> were sent <S%G649><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they asked <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> baptizest thou <S%G907><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> be <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> Elias <S%G2243><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> that prophet <S%G4396><s%>?

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> there standeth one <S%G2476><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>;

He <S%G846><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G846><s%> shoe's <S%G5266><s%> latchet <S%G2438><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> unloose <S%G3089><s%>.

These things <S%G5023><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethabara <S%G962><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%>.

¶ The next day <S%G1887><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> seeth <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> taketh away <S%G142><s%> the sin <S%G266><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, After <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is preferred <S%G1096><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> before <S%G4413><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>.

And I <S%G2504><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> to Israel <S%G2474><s%>, therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> am <S%G2064><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> bare record <S%G3140><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, I saw <S%G2300><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it abode <S%G3306><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And I <S%G2504><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to baptize <S%G907><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>, the same <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Upon <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> thou shalt see <S%G1492><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> remaining <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he which baptizeth <S%G907><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.
And I <S%G2504><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bare record <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
¶ Again <S%G3825><s%> the next day after <S%G1887><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> looking upon <S%G1689><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> as he walked <S%G4043><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>!
And <S%G2532><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turned <S%G4762><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2300><s%> them <S%G846><s%> following <S%G190><s%>, and saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%> <S%G1161><s%> ? They said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>, (which <S%G3739><s%> is to say <S%G3004><s%>, being interpreted <S%G2059><s%>, Master <S%G1320><s%>,) where <S%G4226><s%> dwellest thou <S%G3306><s%>?

He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> . They came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> he dwelt <S%G3306><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abode <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>: for <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the tenth <S%G1182><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>.

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3844><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> speak, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, was <S%G2258><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter's <S%G4074><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>.

He <S%G3778><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We have found <S%G2147><s%> the Messias <S%G3323><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, being interpreted <S%G3177><s%>, the Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he brought <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> beheld <S%G1689><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Jona <S%G2495><s%> : thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt be called <S%G2564><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> , which <S%G3739><s%> is by interpretation <S%G2059><s%>, A stone <S%G4074><s%>.

¶ The day following <S%G1887><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> go forth <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .
Now <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Bethsaida <S%G966><s%>, the city <S%G4172><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>.

Philip <S%G5376><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We have found <S%G2147><s%> him, of whom <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, did write <S%G1125><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%>, the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Can <S%G1410><s%> there any <S%G5100><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> come <S%G1511><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%>? Philip <S%G5376><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%>.

Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Whence <S%G4159><s%> knowest thou <S%G1097><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>?
